title: Wave Planning for Picking
description: A shift manager needs to create a picking wave to release a batch of orders to the floor for fulfillment.

tasks.description: Filter all pending orders to select a group for the next wave (e.g., all 'Expedited Shipping' orders).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully selects a batch of high-priority orders.

tasks.description: Use the wave planning tool to create a new wave from the selected orders.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new wave is created in the system.

tasks.description: The system automatically breaks the wave down into individual picking tasks, optimized by pick path.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates efficient picking assignments for multiple operators.

tasks.description: Release the wave, making the picking tasks available to operators on the floor.
tasks.expected_outcome: The picking tasks appear on the operators' handheld scanners.
